title: PlayPosit
text: is a web-based tool designed for interactive video experiences and assessments. It empowers educators to integrate interactive elements, such as questions, into streaming video content. This includes the flexibility to upload personal videos or use platforms like Wistia, MediaPlus, or YouTube.
featureText: PlayPosit allows educators to embed questions, quizzes, and reflective pauses directly into videos, making it easier to assess student understanding in real-time. This interactive layer transforms passive video-watching into an active learning opportunity, enabling learners to engage more deeply with the content.

features.title: Effortless Authorship
features.text: PlayPosit simplifies the process of creating interactive video content by offering a user-friendly design studio. Educators and content creators can enrich their video content with a variety of powerful interactions, such as multiple-choice questions, graded fill-in-the-blanks, and more. This feature enables instructors to customize their videos to suit their lesson objectives and engage learners effectively.

features.title: Learner Engagement
features.text: Interactivity is key to engaging learners, and PlayPosit strives to replicate the traditional classroom experience within the digital realm. By incorporating interactive elements into videos, such as quizzes, discussions, and activities, PlayPosit enhances learner engagement. Studies have shown that interactive videos can significantly improve learner retention, with PlayPosit boasting a threefold increase in learning efficacy compared to standard video formats.

features.title: Accountable Tracking
features.text: PlayPosit provides educators with immediate and accessible data on learner performance, allowing for effective remediation of concepts and the ability to address any learning deficiencies promptly. This feature enables instructors to track learners' progress, automatically assign grades based on performance, and gain insights into areas that may require additional attention. With PlayPosit's accountable tracking feature, educators can make data-driven decisions to optimize the learning experience for their students.
